title: Bug 116424[Regression]Translation doesn't work in help text of data item.
description: Bug 116424[Regression]Translation doesn't work in help text of data item.
OB: Description:Translation doesn't work in help text of data item.Steps to reproduce:1. run attached file griddataactiondeDE.xml using ReportRunner and setlocale to deDEExpected result:See attached golden file.Actual result:Help text set in the data after the second label still display english words.
